name: Ray Padula Sunny Fun Watering Can
description: Sunny, the watering can is the perfect kid-size watering can. Simply fill Sunny up and kids can easily help water the flowers, vegetables and backyard garden. This watering can offers a friendly design and sturdy construction. Made from ABS plastic, it is UV resistant to help prevent sun damage when left outside. Sunny instantly becomes a kid favorite.Sunny instantly helps makes watering the flowers fun for kidsSmiling flower spout provides a gentle rain-like wateringHolds 1-1/2 gal. of waterHeavy-duty plastic constructionUV resistant agents resist sun damageAges 3 and up
